Headline: CNN 10 - February 19, 2020
Article_Body: February 19, 2020 As the United Kingdom deals with the aftermath of an intense storm, CNN 10 is explaining what made it so dangerous and why it was called a "bomb cyclone." Afterward, we're showing you what it's like to be out and about in Shanghai, China. And after a report on the closure of 125 Macy's stores, we're discussing whether a retail apocalypse is really occurring. TRANSCRIPT Click here to access the printable version of today's CNN 10 transcript. CNN 10 serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts ideal for explanation seekers on the go or in the classroom. The show's priority is to identify stories of international significance and then clearly describe why they're making news, who is affected, and how the events fit into a complex, international society. Thank you for using CNN 10
